title: Steffen Baumgart is Union's New Head Coach | 1. FC Union Berlin
snippet: A year later, Köln finished the Bundesliga season in a safe 11th place before they parted ways in December 2023. This was followed in February by his engagement at Hamburger SV, which ended in November despite their promising position in the promotion race of the current 2. Bundesliga season. Baumgart's professional path is now leading him back to the Alte Försterei for the second time, where he will take charge of the men's team's training for the first time on Thursday, 2 January 2025.

title: Union Berlin install Steffen Baumgart as new head coach | Bundesliga
snippet: Union Berlin have turned to their former forward and captain Steffen Baumgart to lead the club into the New Year following the dismissal of Bo Svensson.
